plot outline: A physician, an actress, a wildlife photographer, and a fashion model: four people, all suspected of crimes but never charged, sit around a table playing bridge. In the next room at a another game of cards are a police detective, a retired criminology professor, a mystery novelist, and an investigative journalist. By the end of the evening, their host Dr. Dasgupta is found murdered. Who is the killer?
title: Chorabali
plot: A whodunit thriller set in the backdrop of North Kolkata with its British Raj charm, based on Agatha Christie's Cards on the Table.
